game.name: GRIDBUSTERS
game.shortDescription: A cozy detective puzzle game where every case is a grid you must investigate, every clue is a piece of logic, and every deduction brings you closer to the truth. Solve handcrafted mysteries across story-driven cases. No guessing — only pure deduction.
